title: I need support with my account, I already tried recovering it but it´s not working
body:
To make it as simple as possible, yesterday I changed my region from NA to EU west, because I had an old account I had to change username and summoner name, next thing I know is that whenever I try to log to my account I end up in my old one, the recovery information from the old one works fine, but when I try to recover my actual account it says "an e-mail has been sent" but I recive nothing (already checked spam), I also checked that I´m on the EU west server.

The purchases are sent to my e-mail as they should, but the recovery information not...

I opened a ticket yesterday and after I sent it with the right information, the response was sent to the other e-mail (what?)

And if I want to see the progress of the ticket I just can´t because I need to log in (this is genius)

replies.body:
Since you're trying to recover your account and have a ticket open, I recommend waiting for an account specialist to get back to you. We've been pretty slammed with ticket lately, so a response may take a bit longer than normal, but rest assured, our teams are working their butts off.

Let me know if you have any questions.

I don´t see this working at all and I see no other support service

I don´t like having to say anything mean but I see no other way to get things done here, If by today I have no answer whatsoever I will cancel my last payments and just leave the game, I´m not starting another account again.

I´m not threatening, don´t mistake me, I´m just saying that I see no alternative and this is the only thing I can do.
